name: es-search-references
description: JavaScript reference tracking by static analysis.  For libraries to test they don't leak memory directly.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --no-experimental-require-module ../../node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js
scripts.debug: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --inspect-brk --no-experimental-require-module ../../node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js
scripts.tasks: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --no-experimental-require-module ../../node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js --tasks
